mapper.insert: insert into db_test_case (name, apply, manager_user_id, commissioning_time, create_time) values (#{name}, #{apply}, #{managerUserId}, #{commissioningTime}, now());
mapper.select:
select dbl.id, dbl.name as name, dbl.apply as apply, dbl.test_user_id as testUserId, dbl.manager_user_id as managerUserId, dbl.create_time as creatTime, dbl.commissioning_time as commissioningTime, dbl.state as state, dbau.admin_fullname as testUserName, dbau2.admin_fullname as managerUserName from db_test_case dbl left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dbl.test_user_id left join db_admin_user dbau2 on dbau2.id = dbl.manager_user_id
where 1=1
and dbl.test_user_id=#{userId}
and (dbl.name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{nameSearch}),"%"))
and (dbl.apply LIKE concat(concat("%",#{applySearch}),"%"))
and (dbau.admin_fullname LIKE concat(concat("%",#{testUserNameSearch}),"%"))
and (dbau2.admin_fullname LIKE concat(concat("%",#{managerUserNameSearch}),"%"))
order by dbl.create_time DESC limit #{page} , #{limit};

select count(*) from db_test_case dbl left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dbl.test_user_id left join db_admin_user dbau2 on dbau2.id = dbl.manager_user_id where 1=1
and test_user_id=#{userId}
and (dbl.name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{nameSearch}),"%"))
and (dbl.apply LIKE concat(concat("%",#{applySearch}),"%"))
and (dbau.admin_fullname LIKE concat(concat("%",#{testUserNameSearch}),"%"))
and (dbau2.admin_fullname LIKE concat(concat("%",#{managerUserNameSearch}),"%"))

select dbl.id, dbl.name as name, dbl.apply as apply, dbl.test_user_id as testUserId, dbl.manager_user_id as managerUserId, dbl.create_time as creatTime, dbl.commissioning_time as commissioningTime, dbl.state as state, dbau.admin_fullname as testUserName, dbau2.admin_fullname as managerUserName from db_test_case dbl left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dbl.test_user_id left join db_admin_user dbau2 on dbau2.id = dbl.manager_user_id where id = #{testCaseId}

select dbl.id, dbl.name as name, dbl.apply as apply, dbl.test_user_id as testUserId, dbl.manager_user_id as managerUserId, dbl.create_time as creatTime, dbl.commissioning_time as commissioningTime, dbl.state as state, dbau.admin_fullname as testUserName, dbau2.admin_fullname as managerUserName from db_test_case dbl left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dbl.test_user_id left join db_admin_user dbau2 on dbau2.id = dbl.manager_user_id order by dbl.create_time DESC;
